VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Oats?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Oats is arc {Potatoes}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Wheat?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Wheat is arc {Corn}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Soybeans to Corn in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Soybeans to Potatoes in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Potatoes to Corn in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Corn and Wheat in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Corn and Wheat is {61}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Potatoes and Soybeans in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Potatoes and Soybeans is {152}.

What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Soybeans?
SC.A: The total flow output from Soybeans is {244}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Corn?
SC.A: The total flow input by Corn is {233}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 168? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {599} from {Wheat} to {Oats}, a flow of {289} from {Oats} to {Wheat}, a flow of {184} from {Potatoes} to {Soybeans}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 66? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {61} from {Wheat} to {Corn}, a flow of {56} from {Corn} to {Wheat}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 86 and 135? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {118} from {Corn} to {Soybeans}, a flow of {92} from {Soybeans} to {Corn}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Corn to Soybeans or from Potatoes to Soybeans?
NC.A: The flow from {Potatoes} to {Soybeans} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Potatoes to Corn, from Potatoes to Soybeans, or from Soybeans to Potatoes?
NC.A: The flow from {Potatoes} to {Soybeans} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Wheat}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Oats} and {Wheat}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Wheat, Arc Oats, Arc Corn, Arc Soybeans, Arc Potatoes}.
